}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "SL-2511CD PLUS MERCURY-1.00" and "701603760000" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Specifications, per the FCC manual, are below... *'''RF Output Power''' **15dBm **20dBm (Long Range PC Card for CE) **23dBm (Long Range PC Card for FCC) *'''Receive Sensitivity''' (@ FER = 0.08) **< -85dBm @ 11Mbps **< -85dBm @ 11Mbps (Long Range PC Card) **< -88dBm @ 5.5Mbps **< -90dBm @ 5.5Mbps (Long Range PC Card) **< -91dBm @ 2Mbps **< -93dBm @ 2Mbps (Long Range PC Card) **< -93dBm @ 1Mbps **< -95dBm @ 1Mbps (Long Range PC Card)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
